remarks: According to ~ df-subc , the subcategories ` ( Subcat `` C ) ` of a category ` C ` are subsets of the homomorphisms of ` C ` ( see ~ subcssc and ~ subcss2 ).  Therefore, the set of unital ring homomorphisms is a "subcategory" of the category of non-unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Mar-2020.)
